video:video.video:title: Keynote - Welcome to .NET 5
video:video.video:description: Scott Hunter, Director of Program Management for .NET, will kick off the day with loads of new demos and some very special guests.

video:video.video:title: .NET Foundation "State of the Foundation"
video:video.video:description: Take a look at what the .NET Foundation has been up to and how to get involved.

video:video.video:title: Whats New in C#?
video:video.video:description: Dustin and Mads take you on a tour of the new features in C# 9.0: Top-level programs remove clutter. Init-only properties and records improve support for immutable and value-based programming. New&#8230;

video:video.video:title: A talk for trailblazers: Blazor in .NET 5
video:video.video:description: Wondering what's in store for Blazor in .NET 5? Wonder no more! This talk features the latest and greatest features to arrive in Blazor as part of .NET 5. From improved APIs for working with the&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Porting Projects to .NET 5
video:video.video:description: Want to move to .NET 5? In this session you'll see how to approach porting projects from .NET Framework, .NET Core, and .NET Standard to .NET 5 and the tools you can use to get there.

video:video.video:title: Entity Framework Core 5.0: The Next Generation for Data Access
video:video.video:description: Use C#, .NET classes, and LINQ to interact with databases like Sqlite, Azure SQL Server and even Azure Cosmos DB from .NET 5 apps with Entity Framework Core. See the latest features in action like&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Modern Web Development with Blazor & .NET 5
video:video.video:description: Blazor isn't just for new apps! Blazor in .NET 5 is integrated seamlessly with ASP.NET Core to enable modern full stack web development with .NET. In this session we'll show you how you can use Blazor&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Xamarin.Forms 5: Beautiful and Fast Apps with Less Code
video:video.video:description: Xamarin.Forms 5 is jam-packed with new features to make it easier than ever to develop fast, beautiful, cross-platform apps. Come see what new features are in Xamarin.Forms 5, and learn more about how&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Developing and Deploying Microservices with 'Tye'
video:video.video:description: Learn about new tooling the .NET team is working on to help you build, debug and deploy microservices faster.

video:video.video:title: Get to know the .NET 5.0 SDK
video:video.video:description: .NET 5 is the next version of .NET Core. The .NET SDK incudes the language compilers for C#, Visual Basic and F#. It also includes NuGet to manage packages, MSBuild to build and publish projects, and&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Introducing F# 5
video:video.video:description: For the past five years, we've been working to make F# as good as it can on .NET Core. With the release of .NET 5, we're also introducing F# 5 - the culmination of this work. F# 5 makes interactive&#8230;

video:video.video:title: .NET 5 Runtime Deep Dive with Rich Lander and the Architects
video:video.video:description: Go deep into some of the .NET 5 runtime features like performance improvements, how single-file applications work, ARM64 support, and more.

video:video.video:title: ML.NET in the Real World
video:video.video:description: Hear from real life .NET developers about the problems they decided to solve with Machine Learning and why they chose ML.NET to add ML to their apps.

video:video.video:title: What's new for desktop developers building WPF, UWP & WinForms
video:video.video:description: In this session we'll be taking you on a tour of what's new for desktop developers building applications using WPF, UWP and Windows Forms. We'll cover improvements in tooling such as what's new in&#8230;

video:video.video:title: High-performance Services with gRPC: What's new in .NET 5
video:video.video:description: gRPC is a high-performance RPC framework used by developers around the world to build fast apps. In this talk you will learn about what's new in gRPC for .NET 5, like performance improvements,&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Developer Fun with Scott Hanselman
video:video.video:description: Wind down a little from the day's sessions and learn some fun new things.

video:video.video:title: GitHub + Visual Studio .NET
video:video.video:description: GitHub and Visual Studio technologies have evolved and provide unique productivity enhancements to all .NET developers. Join this demo-filled session to see how it benefits you.

video:video.video:title: Effectively Diagnose and Debug .NET Apps in Visual Studio
video:video.video:description: Debug .NET Core running on Linux, master async debugging, and squeeze the last bit of performance out of your apps with the new features in Visual Studio.

video:video.video:title: Whats New in Visual Studio 2019 and beyond
video:video.video:description: Learn what's new in latest Visual Studio 2019 as well as features the team is currently working on - including some that we've never shown to the public before.

video:video.video:title: Improve Your Productivity with Roslyn Analyzers
video:video.video:description: Learn about Roslyn Analyzers and how it can supercharge your developer productivity. This session includes tips on how to leverage smart code focused tools, such as code fixes and refactorings and an&#8230;

video:video.video:title: HTTP API Development with .NET, Azure, and OpenAPI: Paper Cuts Begone!
video:video.video:description: If you build HTTP APIs in .NET you probably have ceremonies you iterate through because the construction and testing of HTTP APIs hasn't *ever* been easy. Teams all over Microsoft have been working&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Accelerate .NET to Azure with GitHub Actions
video:video.video:description: GitHub Actions makes it easy to automate all your software workflows, now with world-class CI/CD. Easily deploy your .NET Core application to Azure with just one tool, GitHub.

video:video.video:title: Real-time 3D Games with .NET and Unity
video:video.video:description: Are you curious how to take your .NET skills to 25&#43; platforms like VR, AR, Xbox, and Switch to make amazing games and apps? Join this session to learn more about the Unity real-time 3D development&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Introducing the New and Improved Azure SDK for .NET
video:video.video:description: Come learn about the new Azure SDK for .NET and the improvements to performance, authentication and configuration that we have been working on in the last couple of years.

video:video.video:title: The Missing Piece - Diving into the World of Big Data with .NET for Apache Spark
video:video.video:description: Data is growing at an unprecedented amount with both human generated and machine generated data. Come, learn about the open-source, .NET for Apache Spark project, the same technology that teams such&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Collecting ASP.NET Core Performance Traces in a Kubernetes Cluster
video:video.video:description: Do you need to gather data on CPU usage, memory usage, or other potential performance issues for a containerized ASP.NET Core app? This talk will cover what you need to know to collect performance&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Secretless Development from Local to Cloud with the New Azure SDKs, Project Tye, and Kubernetes
video:video.video:description: Are you tired of managing secrets for local and cloud development? With the new Azure SDKs you can rid your applications of secrets with the new Azure Identity library. Come see how we implemented a&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Setting Up Feature Flags with .NET
video:video.video:description: Let's set up feature flags with .NET! We will walk through how to create a feature flag in the UI, install dependencies, and implement your feature flag in your .NET app.

video:video.video:title: Level-up Your DevOps with GitHub Actions and Kubernetes
video:video.video:description: Are you looking to rapidly deploy your content? Are Docker containers in your future? Come for this demo-only presentation where we start from scratch, build up a DevOps pipeline with GitHub Actions,&#8230;

video:video.video:description: In this talk, I will discuss the migration steps undertaken to go from a complex Desktop application to a robust ASP.NET-backed website with a Blazor front-end. The talk will highlight the ease at&#8230;

video:video.video:description: Caught with an unusual data format and want to convert it to something more friendly? Instead of writing buckets of string manipulation code, use ANTLR and C# to parse and make sense of that data.&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Controlling My Home Sauna Using .NET 5

video:video.video:description: In this talk, I will show you how to build modern and type-safe frontend applications in React with F# as well as showcase the mature ecosystem of tools around it.

video:video.video:title: Building Real-time Applications with Blazor and GraphQL
video:video.video:description: Come see how Blazor and GraphQL combined will revolutionize how we build rich SPA applications with .NET.

video:video.video:description: OmniSharp powers the C# experience in Visual Studio Code. It also inspired the Language Server Protocol that is used to make it such a great editor for your language of choice. Learn about how&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Overview of Single File Applications in .NET 5
video:video.video:description: Single file applications is the part of exiting journey of unifying the .NET platform, with a single framework that extends from desktop, mobile, cloud and beyond. Get an overview of what this means&#8230;

video:video.video:title: .NET for Infrastructure Automation
video:video.video:description: Are you a Software Engineer looking to learn about infrastructure as code? Today, with only .NET, you can now automate your infrastructure deployments. No need to worry about languages you don't know.&#8230;

video:video.video:description: I'll show you the steps to build your first Android application in Visual Studio 2019 with .NET. We will see how to build a basic app and then compile and deploy using Android emulators.

video:video.video:title: Application State in Blazor Apps
video:video.video:description: Carl shows you the benefits of keeping application data outside components and pages, how to do cross-component change notifications, and how to persist that AppState to localstorage.

video:video.video:title: 2 years, 200 applications: A .NET Core Migration at Enterprise Scale
video:video.video:description: Does migrating your organization's codebase to .NET Core feel unattainable? Come be encouraged with the war stories from a massive migration!

video:video.video:title: Blazor Stability Testing Tools for Bullet Proof Applications

video:video.video:description: Machine Learning is a hot topic now. It's used in all kinds of applications: web, desktop, mobile. If you are a .NET developer you already have all the knowledge to create a smart cloud cross-platform&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Trailblazor: Building Dynamic Applications with Blazor
video:video.video:description: Underpinning Blazor's ability to create interactive web UIs using C# instead of JavaScript is a robust component model which offers exciting new opportunities for developers to create dynamic web&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Validation Rules for Xamarin
video:video.video:description: Learn how to spend less time validating users' input and improve the experience offered to users by using validations rules.

video:video.video:title: Building Cross-Platform Desktop Apps with Electron.NET
video:video.video:description: Leverage your ASP.NET skills to deliver native applications for Windows, Mac, and Linux environments using Electron.NET.

video:video.video:title: Running an Azure Static Web App with an API
video:video.video:description: Heard of Azure Static Web Apps? Come join this session to learn how to build and publish an Azure Static Web app in minutes with a backend API.

video:video.video:title: Writing Event Based Microservices using Steeltoe
video:video.video:description: Steeltoe has become a popular .NET framework used in building enterprise grade microservices. Recently Steeltoe added support for building event based microservices using common off the shelf message&#8230;
